definition: to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
see 勇往直前[yong3 wang3 zhi2 qian2]

sentences.english: But I took a stip , just one step forward.
sentences.chinese: 但是我往前走了一步，僅僅一步。

sentences.english: Just go through the ticket checker over there.
It should be further along your right.
sentences.chinese: 應該在你右手邊再往前一些。

sentences.english: Get ahead and know that some of those things they'll catch back up.
sentences.chinese: 往前走，明白有些事情他們會重新追上來。

sentences.english: Numb with cold, we urged the weary horses forward.
sentences.chinese: 我們都凍得發僵，催着疲備的馬繼續往前走。

sentences.english: Agreeable center road's going toward is a teaching building before.
sentences.chinese: 令人愉快的中心路的往前走以前是教學樓。

sentences.english: Every two days, set the alarm for just 10minutes earlier.
sentences.chinese: 每隔兩天，將你的鬧錶往前調個10分鐘。

sentences.english: The woman bristled when I asked her to move.
sentences.chinese: 當我叫那女人往前挪動時，她發怒了。

sentences.english: The stage for life is not big enough for us to rush all the way.
sentences.chinese: 人生的舞臺並不大，容不得我們一直往前衝。

sentences.english: My legs gave out and l couldn't walk any further.
sentences.chinese: 我的腿撐不住了，不能再往前走了。

sentences.english: Walk along this road , and take the fourth turning on the left.
sentences.chinese: 沿着這條路往前走，在第四個轉彎處左拐。

sentences.english: Go straight on, then take the first turning on the left.
sentences.chinese: 一直往前走，然後在第一個轉彎處向左轉。

sentences.english: Running at 24 frames per second, that's the pace of Mark Lee.
sentences.chinese: 他永遠往前跑，一秒二十四格，是李屏賓的步履節奏。

sentences.english: As you inhale, press in with your thumbs and bring your hips forward.
sentences.chinese: 當你吸氣時，用拇指壓住然後把你的腰往前傾。

sentences.english: The crippled old man dragged along slowly.
sentences.chinese: 跛足老人拖着沉着的腳步緩慢地往前走。

definition: from now on/in the future/time to come
to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous
to recoil/to draw back/to fall back/to retreat
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
to fall back/to go in reverse
